lead_paragraph: MURRAY--Heather. Born August 4, 1973, died February 16, 2016. She was the beloved daughter of Conal and Betty. Wake, 2-4 and 6-8pm, Sunday, Cassidy-Flynn Funeral Home, Mt. Kisco, NY. Service, 9:30am, Monday, St. John and St. Mary, Chappaqua, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to St. Francis Memorial Hospital, San Francisco, CA. 1/3
